title: 148861998.enrolling In A New Trajectory
excerpt: Where will you be 3 months from now?

children.text: Where will you be 3 months from now?
In your career? In your relationships? In your health? In your finances? In your immediate growth?
The plan you have now has more impact on your progress than any other intervention you can enroll in.
If you don’t know what you need to do
for the next 90 days, well, you’re not going to get anywhere closer to the targets you have in mind.
Maybe it’s time you had a conversation with your boss, with your spouse, or with yourself?
Made time (in your otherwise busy schedule) to determine a schedule that actually gets you to where you want to be.
Set some short-term targets. Make a plan. Commit for the long haul.
That’s what progress is made of.
